metadata.title: CVE-2024-57965 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In axios before 1.7.8, lib/helpers/isURLSameOrigin.js does not use a URLobject when determining an origin, and has a potentially unwantedsetAttribute('href',href) call. NOTE: some parties feel that the codechange only addresses a warning message from a SAST tool and does not fix avulnerability.

criterions.comment: node-axios package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
